duties_responsibilities.duty: Loads and unloads Customer bags, operates ground service equipment, coordinates aircraft servicing, and prepares aircraft cabin for departure.
Helps with ramp service duties, waste disposal, and aircraft re-servicing.
Assists Customers when needed and complies with ad-hoc requests.
Operates ground service equipment, tags, lifts, and unloads Customer bags (in excess of 100 lbs) from baggage compartment of aircraft and baggage system.
Assists Customers with special needs and guides aircraft to and from aircraft parking locations.
Maintains a safe environment and performs other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or General Education Development (GED) Diploma
